ðŸ“– Summary: Ink Kit is an SDK designed to streamline onchain application development. It provides developers with ready-to-use app layout templates, vibrant themes, and animated components, all designed to create polished and engaging user interfaces. The SDK aims to improve the developer experience by offering customizable and efficient tools for building onchain applications.
